description:
Prana's love a hoodie that can take on the outdoors, and the Sol Defender Hoodie fits the bill perfectly. You’ll love the moisture-wicking properties this versatile men’s style delivers as you explore your next trail, and the UPF protection is an added bonus in the elements.

But if exploring your local neighborhood is more your kind of day trip, this sustainable hoodie will fit right in as well. Because with a clean profile and modern slim fit, it looks good just about anywhere.
name: Prana Sol Defender Hoodie - Slim - Mens
